mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgCompany

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgPerson per left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on per.nPerCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'per' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join `KIMG`.`kimgCompany` c on per.cPerCom = c.cComCode WHERE per.nPerDel = 0 and cPerId = #{cPerId} and cPerPwd = #{cPerPwd}

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgPerson per left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on per.nPerCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'per' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join `KIMG`.`kimgCompany` c on per.cPerCom = c.cComCode WHERE per.nPerDel = 0

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgPerson per left join KIMG.kimgPhoto pho on per.nPerCnt = pho.nRefCode and pho.cPhoType = 'per' and pho.nPhoDel = 0 left join `KIMG`.`kimgCompany` c on per.cPerCom = c.cComCode WHERE per.nPerDel = 0 and (per.cPerName like CONCAT('%',#{vo},'%') or per.cPerId like CONCAT('%',#{vo},'%') or c.cComName like CONCAT('%',#{vo},'%'))
select * from `KIMG`.`kimgPhoto` WHERE `cPhoType` = #{cPhoType} and `nRefCode` = #{nRefCode} and `nPhoDel` = 0
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgProduct where nPrdDel = 0;

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgProduct where nPrdDel = 0 and ( 1=1
and cPrdLocalName like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdLocalName},'%')
and cPrdName like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdName},'%')
and cPrdCode like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdCode},'%')
and cPrdCat like CONCAT('%',#{cPrdCat},'%')
)

SELECT item.`nItmCnt`, item.`cItmCode`, item.`cItmCom`, item.`cItmVenue`, item.`cItmSport`, item.`cItmDept`, item.`cItmEvent`, item.`cItmCate`, item.`cItmProd`, item.`cItmMate`, item.`cItmFloor`, item.`cItmLocation`, item.`cItmWidth`, item.`cItmHeight`, item.`cItmDimen`, item.`cItmQty1`, item.`cItemUnit1`, item.`cItmQty2`, item.`cItmUnit2`, item.`cItmDesc`, item.`cItmUnitPrice1`, item.`cItmPrice1`, item.`cItmMateUnitPrice1`, item.`cItmMatePrice1`, item.`cImtLaborUnitPrice1`, item.`cItmLaborPrice1`, item.`cItmUnitPrice2`, item.`cItmPrice2`, item.`cItmMateUnitPrice2`, item.`cItmMatePrice2`, item.`cImtLaborUnitPrice2`, item.`cItmLaborPrice2`, item.`dItmCrt`, item.`cItmCrtUsr`, item.`dItmMod`, item.`cItmModUsr`, item.`nItmDel`, (SELECT count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = nItmCnt and nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'MAN' and cTskStatus = 'CNF') as 'nManStatus', (SELECT count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = nItmCnt and nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'INS'and cTskStatus = 'CNF') as 'nInsStatus', (SELECT count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = nItmCnt and nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'DES' and cTskStatus = 'CNF') as 'nDesStatus', (SELECT count(0) FROM KIMG.kimgTask where nRefItm = nItmCnt and nTskDel = 0 and cTskType = 'INC' and cTskStatus in ('TRQ', 'ERQ')) as 'nIncStatus', prod.cPrdName, cat.cCatName FROM KIMG.kimgItem item left join KIMG.kimgProduct prod on item.cItmProd = prod.cPrdCode left join KIMG.kimgCategory cat on item.cItmCate = cat.cCatType left join KIMG.kimgEvent eve on item.cItmEvent = eve.cEvnCode left join KIMG.kimgVenue ven on item.cItmVenue = ven.cVenCode left join KIMG.kimgSport spor on item.cItmSport = spor.cSptCode left join KIMG.kimgDepartment dep on item.cItmDept = dep.cDptCode where nItmDel = 0 and ( 1=1
and item.cItmCode like CONCAT('%',#{cItmCode},'%')
and item.cItmProd like CONCAT('%',#{cItmProd},'%')
and item.cItmMate like CONCAT('%',#{cItmMate},'%')
and item.cItmCom like CONCAT('%',#{cItmCom},'%')
and item.cItmVenue like CONCAT('%',#{cItmVenue},'%')
and item.cItmSport like CONCAT('%',#{cItmSport},'%')
and item.cItmDept like CONCAT('%',#{cItmDept},'%')
and item.cItmEvent like CONCAT('%',#{cItmEvent},'%')
)

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgItem item left join KIMG.kimgProduct prod on item.cItmProd = prod.cPrdCode left join KIMG.kimgCategory cat on item.cItmCate = cat.cCatType left join KIMG.kimgEvent eve on item.cItmEvent = eve.cEvnCode left join KIMG.kimgVenue ven on item.cItmVenue = ven.cVenCode left join KIMG.kimgSport spor on item.cItmSport = spor.cSptCode left join KIMG.kimgDepartment dep on item.cItmDept = dep.cDptCode where nItmDel = 0 and item.nItmCnt = #{param}
SELECT distinct cItmMate FROM KIMG.kimgItem
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgCategory
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgEvent
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgSport
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgDepartment
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgVenue
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTaskStatus;
SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTaskType;

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ts on t.cTskStatus = ts.cTstType LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskType tt on t.cTskType = tt.cTtpType where nRefItm = #{param} and nTskDel = 0 ORDER BY t.nTskCnt desc;

SELECT * FROM KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus ts on t.cTskStatus = ts.cTstType LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskType tt on t.cTskType = tt.cTtpType left Join KIMG.kimgItem it on t.nRefItm = it.nItmCnt left join KIMG.kimgEvent ev on it.cItmEvent = ev.cEvnCode left join KIMG.kimgCategory cat on it.cItmCate = cat.cCatType left join KIMG.kimgProduct pro on it.cItmProd = pro.cPrdCode where nTskDel = 0 and it.nItmDel = 0 ORDER BY t.nTskCnt desc;
select * from KIMG.kimgDash order by nDasCnt desc limit 1

select * from KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus s on t.cTskType = s.cTstType left Join KIMG.kimgItem it on t.nRefItm = it.nItmCnt where cTskType = 'INC' and nTskDel = 0 order by t.nTskCnt desc

select * from KIMG.kimgTask t LEFT JOIN KIMG.kimgTaskStatus s on t.cTskType = s.cTstType left Join KIMG.kimgItem it on t.nRefItm = it.nItmCnt where 1=1
and t.nTskCnt like CONCAT('%',#{nTskCnt},'%')
and it.cItmCode like CONCAT('%',#{cItmCode},'%')
and t.cTskStatus like CONCAT('%',#{cTskStatus},'%')
and it.cItmVenue like CONCAT('%',#{cItmVenue},'%')
and t.cTskCrtUsr like CONCAT('%',#{cTskCrtUsr},'%')
and t.cTskNote like CONCAT('%',#{cTskNote},'%')
and cTskType = 'INC' and nTskDel = 0 order by t.nTskCnt desc
